summary: Russian translation of the Dovahkiin Hideout by Shawkab
descriptionHtml:
Russian translation of the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12553][b]Dovahkiin Hideout[/b][/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3134617]Shawkab[/url]
Readme included.

PLEASE, INSTALL ORIGINAL VERSION FIRST, AND AFTER - THIS TRANSLATION!

Thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3134617][b]Shawkab[/b][/url] for good mod and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1307335][b]henius[/b][/url] for first russian translation.

[u]All Credits and permissions to Shawkab[/u]

[b][u]PS: No comments - no updates. Read comments from others and add yours, please.[/u][/b]
[b][u]PS: Ne budet kommentariev - ne budet obnovlenij. Pishite kommentarii, pojaluista.[/u][/b]

[b]PPS:[/b] [color=green][b]ENDORSE ME[/b][/color] v perevode - podderjite (odobrite) menja :D
author: Shawlab Shadowmann Henius
